title: Jack Rodwell spotted at Roma's training ground as he prepares to undergo a medical
text:
Jack Rodwell has been spotted at Roma's training ground as he prepares to undergo a medical ahead of sealing a shock move to the Serie A club.

Rodwell has been a free agent after leaving Championship side Blackburn Rovers at the end of last season but is now on the verge of a move to Italy.

Roma have been beset by a spate of injuries at the back and Sportsmail revealed on Thursday that Roma view Rodwell as the perfect candidate to bolster their squad.

Rodwell has been a free agent since leaving Championship club Blackburn Rovers in July

Rodwell made 22 appearances in all competitions for Blackburn last season

Rodwell, who has seen his own career hampered by injuries, will undergo a series of fitness tests before the club make a final decision over a deal.

The 28-year-old began his career at Everton, where he emerged as one of England's hottest prospects before sealing a move to Manchester City in 2012.

However, injuries and a loss of form saw him make just 16 appearances in two disappointing seasons at the Etihad before he moved on to Sunderland.

Rodwell previously spent four years at Sunderland but made just 76 appearances for the club

Rodwell's time with the Black Cats was equally frustrating as injuries again took their toll. He was also criticised for staying at the Stadium of Light on a £43,000-a-week deal despite being firmly out favour and the club suffering financial difficulties.

The former England international's contract was eventually cancelled in June 2018, before he spent last season with Blackburn, where he made 22 appearances in all competitions.

If he completes his move to Roma, Rodwell will join another Englishman, Chris Smalling, at the Stadio Olimpico, who is on a 12-month loan from Manchester United.
description: Jack Rodwell has been spotted at Roma's training ground as he prepares to undergo a medical ahead of sealing a shock move to the Serie A club. The defender is a free agent after leaving Blackburn.
